sub_title: Product Manager & Product Owner & Engineer Manager
summary:
Over the past thirteen years, I have dedicated a considerable amount of time and effort to learn more motivation techniques, product management and agile frameworks to always deliver better products and positive experiences. 
I believe in work with fun and passion ir a recipe to build great teams and products, that's why I like to be a leader and listen and help my team mates.
My day is full of scrum cerimonies, team motivation, roadmap analysis, products vision and initiation with everything that an agile and product environment must have.
As a product manager, my goal is to ensure that the team is engaged and properly committed to deliveries. Always giving clarity of purpose and focus explaining and being transparent with KPI's that the company wants to achieve. Acting on team motivation, I like to make sure everyone is always aligned with product decisions, how they achieve their goals, and why changes must happen.

projects.title: Ace Card
projects.description:
First independent product of Reacharge.com.
Is pre paid card where you use online any marketplace you need or even for gambling online.
With a mastercard flag and all online data protection  to make sure payments can be made will all security. This Project was released in May 2022 in France and still bringing revenue to the company.

projects.title: Santander - Innovation Validade
projects.description:
Working as a product manager on the Santander Innovation Validade managing all the ideias with the teams and organising step by step. Since the validation of the ideia, the marketing campaign and the final development step to launch the product.
Manage the teams using scrum and other agile frameworks.
Attending all meetings in Madrid - Spain, and in San Francisco - USA.

projects.title: Bird ID
projects.description:
Bird ID is a web and mobile platform that allows the issuance of a Digital Certificate in the cloud.
A solution that brings total freedom and security to users who have digital certificate. You can install drivers or use cryptographic (Token and Smartcard) media, and you can use it directly on smartphones through the Bird ID application.

projects.title: BrasilPrev - Simulador de Previdência
projects.description:
Pension simulator is a web platform that allows insurance consultants and Brazilian bank shares to make insurance and investment simulations and present the best investment options to bank customers in Brazil.
The platform presents graphs and analytical proportions, generating the profile and the best forms of investment.

contributors.headline: Product Manager & Product Owner & Engineer Manager
Product Manager & Product Owner & Engineer Manager

profile_positions.description: As a Senior Product Manager at SmartLockr, I had the objective of working as a facilitator between the product team and other company departments. Working with process organization and product refinement to ensure clear communication with stakeholders and directly focus on company goals for each quarter. At Smartlockr, it was the focus and part of the position to ensure product discovery, usability testing, be focused on data driven decision-making and refine the pull of feature requests, focusing on those that would guarantee more revenue and achieve goals for the company.
profile_positions.title: Head of Product

profile_positions.description: At Recharge.com I had the opportunity to execute the whole product life cycle. From product introduction to maintain. I lead the development team using scrum and kanban always with a refined backlog with a clear product vision to every quarter. Working with agile and a clear communication. Part of my responsibilities was keep a clear communication channel between all stakeholders for that I user a stakeholder matrix to manager the updates and collaboration. With a good product discovery, product vision and usability test, in less than one year we were able to launch the https://ace-card.com/ in France
profile_positions.title: Senior Product Owner

profile_positions.description: After being promoted to Product Manager at the digital ilia, my responsibilities were focused on customers outside Brazil, specifically Europe and USA. The goals were to launch digital products in these two markets running the entire development lifecycle from conceive to maintain. With my team, I was responsible for carrying out product discovery, usability testing, creating roadmaps with a clear product vision and being very analytical about data driven decisions. With this product ownership we were able to launch different products in Europe and the USA. Part os the position was also present clear data for all stakeholders, so I was responsible to execute an internal and external stakeholder management.
profile_positions.title: Senior Product Manager

profile_positions.description: As project leader in ília I was responsible to lead dev squads with specific goals of launch digital products. I used Scrum to and Kanban to create an agile environment with the team and clear the business that was need to implement and delivery. Part of this position was keep the team motivated, control the budget and manage the risks clearly and effectively. For this responsibilities I used management 3.0 practices and analytical skills to make decisions related to the product and to the team. Was also important to execute a weekly cerimonies with the main stakeholders to share budget and risks information. I created a process with the main stakeholders and departments to always update the information and put all in the same page.
profile_positions.title: Project Lead

profile_positions.description: My time as product owner for cast group was fully focus on projects for Brazilian government. The main responsibility was to keep the backlog updated with our customers needs. I was able to run scrum cerimonies leading the team and removing the blockers and impediments. Many achievements happened for many municipalities in Brasil executing a clean backlog prioritized with a moscow framework together with the stakeholders. With these releases we are able to increase the company revenue every year.
profile_positions.title: Product Owner

profile_positions.description: My work at Visent was fully related to JAVA development. I was responsible to implement and maintain their main product called CDRView. All features requests and hot-fixes was my responsibility day by day. I was also responsable to lead scrum cerimonies acting like a scrum master together with my manager. Updates of the technology was part of the roles and with my technical skills the team was able to increase the product quality removing all technical debt. With this development focused on new technologies the company was able to sign new contracts increasing the revenue.
profile_positions.title: System Analyst

profile_positions.description: PoliSys gave me the opportunity to start my career in the world. I started as a JAVA developer working with JSF, Sprint and Hibernate. I was able to code in JAVA for many projects all to Brazilian municipalities and agencies. Also part of the position to integrate wth database and data management in all those projects.
profile_positions.title: Java Web Developer
